name: Kentei TV! Wii: Minna de Gotouchi Quiz Battle
overview: (Google Translated from Japanese WiiWare page) "Kentei TV! Wii "is a quiz game that anyone can play alone. It is a quiz game that anyone can enjoy from adults to children with intuitive operation methods using the Wii remote control and abundant quiz problems of over 5,000 questions. Up to 4 people can play at the same time. From "Hello, I see." From "Hello, I see, it's funny! But interesting !!" You can know various knowledge related to rural areas with fun game quizzes while playing. ¦ Various game modes You can enjoy "Kentei Challenge Mode" for one person who measures your love Ken degree, "Sengoku Kentei national stealing war" that you can enjoy national stealing battle with up to 4 people, and even play quiz program feeling "Everyone Kentei Quiz SHOW! "3 modes are recorded. ¦ Mini game using Wii remote control Multiple fun mini games using Wii remote control are prepared. You can enjoy it as a party game that is not limited to just a quiz game.
